issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Using this code to create a Menu in Android:
http://gist.github.com/246835

This is what it looks like with the 1.5 SDK:
http://skitch.com/davglass/nj218/titanium-0.7.0-android

Everything looks fine, icon and text.

Now using the 2.0 SDK with the same code:
http://skitch.com/davglass/nj2ub/titanium-android-sdk-2.0

All you get are big icons, but no text.

{html}
fields.summary: Android Menu Items differ with different SDK
